title: Uwork
subtitle: UI/UX Design & Web Development
description: At La Capsule Bootcamp, I conceptualized and brought to life Uwork, a cutting-edge mobile app. Uwork seamlessly bridges the gap between jobseekers and companies, revolutionizing the traditional hiring process by simplifying and democratizing it. Through this project, I demonstrate my mastery in mobile app development and UX design, creating a user-friendly and accessible platform.
